title: This $70 Lamp from IKEA Is the Secret to Making Any Room Look Expensive
description: It’s stylish enough to double as decor. READ MORE...
author: Tamieka Welsh
excerpt: It’s stylish enough to double as decor.
text: DecoratingDecor & AccessoriesShoppingTamieka WelshEditorial AssistantTamieka received her Bachelor's degree in social work from North Carolina A&T State University and her Master’s in social work with a concentration in Clinical Mental Health from Columbia University. While she didn’t take the traditional route to journalism, her passion for…read morepublished about 8 hours agoWe independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.Credit: Walter Cicchetti/ShutterstockAlthough I moved into a new apartment a while ago, I’m always still looking for home items that will elevate my space in style or storage, whether it’s cute cups, storage finds, or lamps. The store doesn’t matter, either. It could be HomeGoods, Aldi, or IKEA — I’ll search high and low for great finds. And that’s what happened on my latest IKEA scroll: I discovered the $70 AKTERSPRING table lamp. It’s absolutely stunning and reminds me of a vintage home find — I couldn’t resist clicking on it. What Is The AKTERSPRING Table Lamp?The AKTERSPRING is a table lamp that will complement any room it’s in. However, this isn’t just a lamp; it’s a statement piece. The opal glass gives it a soft, stylish look while the brass-plated base adds a sleek finish that ties everything together. It stands 15 inches tall, 12 inches long, and 8 inches wide, making it the perfect size for a nightstand, work desk, or kitchen table.The lamp blends function and style effortlessly — and it’s super easy to clean. Just wipe it down with a dry cloth. But it’s important to know that the light bulbs are sold separately. If you do consider purchasing, IKEA recommends the SOLHETTA LED bulb for best results.Why We’re into It This lamp looks like it came off of a vintage-inspired mood board, but the scalloped lampshade gives it an Art Nouveau feel — it reminds me of a mushroom. This lamp instantly adds style and dimension to any room it’s placed in, making it the ideal lamp for anyone who’s looking to upgrade their space with ease. IKEA shoppers who’ve actually purchased it are loving it as much as I am. “Cute lamp reminds me of an executive office you’ll see on TV but cuter. … It provides great lighting. … I would recommend it,” one says. Another shares, “I’ve been needing to replace the awful lamp on my sideboard, but nothing quite fits until now! In addition to being lovely on its own, it pairs perfectly with my chandelier. Only note, make sure you have the right type of bulbs.”Why You Should Trust UsI know how important it is to find things that are both cute and functional, without taking up too much room. Whether it’s a lamp that doubles as decor or smart storage that saves your sanity (and space), trust me when I say this find will elevate your space. This lamp blends function and style effortlessly, and it’s absolutely adorable. It adds a soft, cozy mood light to any space while doubling as decor — perfect for creating a relaxing vibe. Honestly, who doesn’t want that? More to Love from Apartment Therapy
html:
• Decorating
  • Decor & Accessories
  • Shopping

Tamieka WelshEditorial Assistant

Tamieka received her Bachelor's degree in social work from North Carolina A&T State University and her Master’s in social work with a concentration in Clinical Mental Health from Columbia University. While she didn’t take the traditional route to journalism, her passion for…read more

published about 8 hours ago

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

Although I moved into a new apartment a while ago, I’m always still looking for home items that will elevate my space in style or storage, whether it’s cute cups, storage finds, or lamps. The store doesn’t matter, either. It could be HomeGoods, Aldi, or IKEA — I’ll search high and low for great finds. And that’s what happened on my latest IKEA scroll: I discovered the $70 AKTERSPRING table lamp. It’s absolutely stunning and reminds me of a vintage home find — I couldn’t resist clicking on it. 

What Is The AKTERSPRING Table Lamp?

The AKTERSPRING is a table lamp that will complement any room it’s in. However, this isn’t just a lamp; it’s a statement piece. The opal glass gives it a soft, stylish look while the brass-plated base adds a sleek finish that ties everything together. It stands 15 inches tall, 12 inches long, and 8 inches wide, making it the perfect size for a nightstand, work desk, or kitchen table.

The lamp blends function and style effortlessly — and it’s super easy to clean. Just wipe it down with a dry cloth. But it’s important to know that the light bulbs are sold separately. If you do consider purchasing, IKEA recommends the SOLHETTA LED bulb for best results.

Why We’re into It 

This lamp looks like it came off of a vintage-inspired mood board, but the scalloped lampshade gives it an Art Nouveau feel — it reminds me of a mushroom. This lamp instantly adds style and dimension to any room it’s placed in, making it the ideal lamp for anyone who’s looking to upgrade their space with ease. 

IKEA shoppers who’ve actually purchased it are loving it as much as I am. “Cute lamp reminds me of an executive office you’ll see on TV but cuter. … It provides great lighting. … I would recommend it,” one says. Another shares, “I’ve been needing to replace the awful lamp on my sideboard, but nothing quite fits until now! In addition to being lovely on its own, it pairs perfectly with my chandelier. Only note, make sure you have the right type of bulbs.”

Why You Should Trust Us

I know how important it is to find things that are both cute and functional, without taking up too much room. Whether it’s a lamp that doubles as decor or smart storage that saves your sanity (and space), trust me when I say this find will elevate your space. This lamp blends function and style effortlessly, and it’s absolutely adorable. It adds a soft, cozy mood light to any space while doubling as decor — perfect for creating a relaxing vibe. Honestly, who doesn’t want that? 

More to Love from Apartment Therapy
